comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: "A little extra time"??? Fourmile out to Salina takes over an hour all by itself. On a road bike. Sheesh. I have meetings from 11:30 - 4 (no Thanksgiving lull down on east campus), so no ride for me today.

comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Hmmm, this sounds interesting. Should Hideo bail on the Eagle Trail ride, when would you be leaving??

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: Replacement mini-Ride Report: I took the winds down to Celestial Seasonings to pick up some tea for my uncle. I also stopped by _pussy willow lane_ so I could egg DU's house (why not? I was in the neighborhood). All in all, a good ride, albeit a bit head-windy.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Yowser! The Replacement has drawn a bead on my humble abode. Glad he's contented himself w/ eggs; they'll give the old shack a healthy sheen (tho' I doubt the prissy neighbors will countenance the smell.) Celestial Seasonings is a pleasant enough enterprise to have in the 'hood. I was a horribly shocked, though, when I learned they were doling out their original "Sleepy Time" blend to the resident prairie dogs under cover of darkness. I'd like to see the lable art for _that_ little episode.
